name: communication-server-mcp
description: Clean, organized email-like messaging for AI agents with 7 essential tools for agent communication and management

scripts.restart: npm run kill-all && sleep 1 && npm run start:unique
scripts.start:clean: npm run kill-all && sleep 2 && npm run start:unique
scripts.test: echo 'Testing via JSONRPC stdin/stdout' && echo '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "id": 1, "method": "tools/list", "params": {}}' | timeout 10s node dist/index.js
scripts.postinstall: node scripts/postinstall.js || true && chmod +x dist/index.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js

author: Communication Server Team <team@communication-server.com>

mcp.name: communication-server
mcp.description: Clean, organized email-like messaging for AI agents with 7 essential tools for agent communication and management
